meta.title: From CROSS to WORDS
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: The [Midwest Crossword Tournament](https://www.mwxwt.com/) is today! Hundreds of contestants are gathering in Chicago to solve a set of custom-made crosswords. We’re sponsors of the event, as well as contestants. [Sign up here](https://www.mwxwt.com/) to learn about next year’s event. If you’re hungry for more puzzles, especially crosswords, check out our newsletter [Signals](https://signals.mysteryleague.com/), where we publish our own crosswords — with a twist.

ladder.clue: Change one letter in <> to get a shoe brand
Change the first letter in <>, then reverse it, to get a piece of music
Append an /n/ sound to <> to get something you do with your hands
Insert a /t/ sound into <> to get a drinking vessel
Change the /ī/ (long i) sound in <> to an /ō/ (long o) to get a rock
"The {} in the <>", a classic British novel
Move the first letter of <> to the end to get things that I hope don't fail you
